hacks.name: Song Bypass
hacks.desc: Allows the downloading of banned songs.

hacks.name: Text Length
hacks.desc: Allows for unlimited text length in text inputs.

hacks.name: Character Filter
hacks.desc: Lets you input any character in all text inputs.

hacks.name: Slider Limit
hacks.desc: Lets sliders be dragged beyond the visible limit.

hacks.name: Backup Stars Limit
hacks.desc: Lets you backup data, even with less than 10 stars.
